name: San Cunha
aboutDesc: I hold a degree in Computer Science with expertise in the field of APIs, and I have knowledge in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. In recent years, I've been studying design patterns for creating tools, alongside being a great enthusiast of combinatorial optimization and its algorithms, focusing on the traveling salesman and vehicle routing problems.
desc: Explore the possibilities of robust and efficient API development or the creation of tools to accelerate internal production processes. With expertise in delivering tailored solutions

projects.project-desc: Tool to connect and perform actions on different databases
Tool for converting requests and responses from JSON to XML and vice versa
Tool to Visualize ACO using the Pygame library.
